Pages.Text: To cast a spell, first go to the Inventory panel, and place your wand in your WEAPON SLOT. Then click the dove icon to enter Spellcasting mode; this displays a SPELLCASTING BAR that lists your favorite spells, and shows the charge of the spell that's currently ready. Select the spell you want from the spellcasting bar, then select a target (if needed), then click the Cast button.
